actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution to reaffirm the use of the phase, "Under God", in the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag of the United States.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that the phrase "Under God," shall be reaffirmed and shall continue to be part of the Pledge of Allegiance.

titles.title: A resolution to reaffirm the use of the phase, "Under God", in the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag of the United States.
